Source Code
===========

All the source code for libpfasst is contained in the 'libpfasst/src' directory.
Libpfasst is, for the most part, written in Fortran 90.  However, it
also uses procedure pointers and the ISO C binding module from Fortran
2003.

Documentation of the source code generated by FORD is `here <https://pfasst.bitbucket.io/FORD/doc/index.html>`_.

hello?

Documentation of the source code generated by FORD is `here <../../FORD/doc/index.html>`_.
